per_frame_4=q2 = .5;
per_frame_5=q3 = count;
per_frame_6=q4 = aspectx;
per_frame_7=q5 = aspecty;
per_frame_8=//zoom = .99 + 0.1*bass_att+0.05*bass;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    float1 d = 0.0009;
warp_4=`    float1 dx = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(d,0)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(d,0)) ).y;
warp_5=`    float1 dy = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(0,d)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(0,d)) ).y;
warp_6=`    float2 my_uv = uv - float2(dx,dy)*0.01;
warp_7=`
warp_8=`
warp_9=`
warp_10=`    float2 v = 0.01;
warp_11=`    ret.y = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, my_uv-floor(my_uv)).y;
warp_12=`
warp_13=`    
warp_14=`    ret.y += (ret.y - GetBlur3(my_uv-floor(my_uv)).y)*.1;
warp_15=`    ret.y += 0.006;//-GetBlur3(uv-floor(uv)).x*5;
warp_16=`
warp_17=`    ret.y = lerp( ret.y, lum(ret).x, 0);
warp_18=`ret.x = ret.y;
warp_19=`ret.z = ret.y;
warp_20=`
warp_21=`//--------------------------------
warp_22=`
warp_23=`    d = 0.01;
warp_24=`    my_uv = float2(-dy,dx)*0.05;
warp_25=`
warp_26=`//    dx = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(d,0)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(d,0)) ).z;
warp_27=`//    dy = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(0,d)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(0,d)) ).z;
warp_28=`  //  my_uv += uv - float2(dx,dy)*0.005;
warp_29=`
warp_30=`
warp_31=`
warp_32=`    v = 0.01;
warp_33=`//    ret.z =tex2D( sampler_fw_main, my_uv - floor(my_uv)).z;
warp_34=`
warp_35=`    
warp_36=`  //  ret.z += (ret.z - GetBlur3(my_uv-floor(my_uv)).z)*0.13;
warp_37=`    //ret.z *= 0.95;
warp_38=`//    ret.z += 0.03-GetBlur3(uv-floor(uv)).x - tex2D( sampler_main, my_uv - floor(my_uv)).y*0.05;
warp_39=`
warp_40=`//    ret.x = tex2D( sampler_main, uv).x * 0.003;
warp_41=`
warp_42=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`float2 uv1 = uv-.5;
comp_5=`
comp_6=`float3 ret1 = tex2D(sampler_main, uv) +tex2D(sampler_main, 1-uv)*0;
comp_7=`
comp_8=`
comp_9=`float2 hor = float2 (texsize.z,0);
comp_10=`float2 ver = float2 (0,texsize.w);
comp_11=`float dx = GetPixel (uv-hor) - GetPixel (uv+hor);
comp_12=`float dy = GetPixel (uv-ver) - GetPixel (uv+ver);
comp_13=`float2 dz = float2 (dx,dy);
comp_14=`
comp_15=`uv1 = .3*cos(uv1*2+1.7) -2*dz;;
comp_16=`float3 dots = saturate(.03/length(uv1));
comp_17=`
comp_18=`
comp_19=`ret1 = (-ret1/4) + 6*dots*(-0.08+ret1);
comp_20=`
comp_21=`ret = lum(ret1)*rand_preset;
comp_22=`}
